title: Brick, Hdwd, Skyline, SS, Gran, No fee, Sept 1
posting_body: September 1
Skylit Penthouse with City Skyline, Exposed Brick, Gran/SS kit on a brick rowed Gas lit street--parking 2 sides
NO FEE-Landlord lives next door!
Compare that in your price shopping.
NO PETS/NON SMOKERS, Max 2 adults
All exquisitely remodeled.
Gas Lit Baldwin Street-#67-3, No fee drops the cost of this unit to a one bed price tag.
Cheap heat makes it something to look at.
The quality workmanship gives you something to show off once its home.
FEATURES; 1000 sq ft
- Skylight floods the living area with light
- 3rd floor of a 3 family brick house
- Granite/Stainless Steel Kitchen
- Cherry Wood Cabinets
- Restored Original Hardwood Floors
- Exposed Brick Walls
- Gas Lit-Brick Rowed Street-safe neighborhood
- Laundry Room
- 3 Doors from Bus to Downtown-3 Blocks to
- Orange Line-Sullivan Square
- Gas Heat by tenant/New Windows and Heating System
- Stainless Appliances
- Convection Stove, D&D
- On-street parking with Resident sticker=free
This is a great place-smoke free building, no pets-sorry.
Very high quality custom carpentry and tile work.
You will be able to show off the quality of this place.
Cheap to heat, new windows and insulation between floors so no surprises.
Gas heat, timer thermostat.
Patio set in pics does not stay with unit--small bistro set will.
Bedrooms are not same size--could be an office.
1000 square feet, cheap to heat / 3rd floor of a 3 family on a gas lit street--insulated between floors for heat and sound / Bus to downtown Boston is 3 doors away /3
blocks from Orange Line.
Baldwin St is mostly owner occupied brick buildings, not located at the bars or projects so the congestion is much less.
A brick row, tree lined, gas lit street with parking on both sides.
Similar to Back bay, Beacon Hill, South End and North End being all brick and gas lit.
Very Quiet property, well maintained by owner who lives next door
Old charm; Original mantle, double brick arches over the windows in exposed brick walls make this very special.
1 wall of exposed brick in every room.
Brick is all sealed up so no dust from brick.
Antique original mantle goes along with brick to make this a special place.
Gas lights in front of the house.
New charm; kitchen appliances and bath keep the place up to date--very nice place.
Bright and Sunny unit.
Kitchen is all glass, 9' ceilings and open floor plan, Laundry just downstairs.
No fee and cheap to heat make this unit work for people s budget and allow them to enjoy a nicer place in a 'great' neighborhood.
Area; This Charlestown/ Boston neighborhood and building are a "very" quiet, residential, brick row; Gas lit Baldwin Street, not near the projects or bars, so congestion less and parking more.
Resident permit parking, 2 sided tree lined street.
93 bus is 3 doors away 92 at bottom of the street to downtown, Orange line Sullivan Square is a 2 block walk with buss, to Cambridge.
1 Mile to Downtown (Financial Dist. etc.)
Ramp to 93 North, Rte 1, Storrow, Memorial Drive is easy.
Located next to new Armory condos, New open space off the balcony looks down at nice garden and city view.
Please provide some info about; move date, couple, single, roomies, and any specific needs.
